title: Chicken Udon Noodle Soup
ingredients: 1 ½ (32 fluid ounce) containers chicken stock
1 large cooked skinless, boneless chicken breast, chopped
method: Step 2: Bring chicken stock, ginger, chili powder, and garlic to a boil in a pot over medium-high heat.
Step 3: Add chicken, bok choy, and mushrooms; reduce heat and simmer lightly for 3 minutes.
Step 4: Add noodles and cook for 4 minutes.
Step 5: Ladle soup mixture into bowls. Garnish with bean sprouts, green onion, dried onion, and cilantro.
